name: Cloud Customer Area
author: TotalPress.org

sections.description:
The only plugin to create and manage a reserved customer area, using cloud services (ex: Google Drive).

What else? What are you waiting for? Start now!

Do you like the Cloud Customer Area plugin? Leave a 5-Star Review to recommend it to other users.

SUPPORT THE PROJECT

❤ WRITE A REVIEW
❤ SEND A DONATION
❤ BECOME PRO (support and get benefits)
❤ BECOME TRANSLATION CONTRIBUTOR

QUICK LINKS

  • SUPPORT
  • DOCUMENTATION
  • SEND SUGGESTIONS

Why choose Cloud Customer Area plugin

“Cloud Customer Area” is free and will save you time, and therefore money!
You can create a reserved area on your website, to manage the exchange of documents with your customers.
Using the power, security and storage space of cloud services (currently only Google Drive).
This plugin is written using only functions included in the WordPress core, so it does not reduce the performance of your website and does not cause compatibility problems.
You can use the “Cloud Customer Area” plugin with any theme builder, with any theme and with any plugin. It’s perfect!

Files created with Google apps can be downloaded via the plugin only if the size does not exceed 10mb.

Cloud Customer Area features

Features included in the “Cloud Customer Area” plugin:

  • not use website or server storage space;
  • Google Drive offers 15 GB of free storage;
  • documents organized in folders;
  • manage customer files directly from the cloud;
  • customers can view / download files from your website;
  • customize the style and labels of the shortcode frontend.

⚡ Cloud Customer Area – PRO FEATURES ⚡

✔ CHOICE OF CUSTOMER ROLES INCLUDING GUESTS
✔ CUSTOMERS CAN UPLOAD FILES
✔ FILE TYPE LIMIT
✔ FILE SIZE LIMIT
✔ UNLIMITED PRO UPDATES
✔ PRO SUPPORT PRIORITY

Cloud Customer Area video

This video shows how easy it is to view / upload files via your website.
The appearance of the UX may be different (each update includes many improvements, even of the UX).

Cloud Customer Area SHORTCODE

[cloud-customer-area]

It shows the table of files to choosen customer roles, in the PRO version it shows the file upload form.

Cloud Customer Area development functions

Using the “Cloud Customer Area” plugin you will have some PHP functions that you can use in your files:

DOCUMENTATION FOR DEVELOPER

Do you need other functions? Ask the developer from the support section.

Cloud Customer Area credits

The “Cloud Customer Area” plugin was entirely designed and created by Andrea De Giovine.
If you like the idea and want to support the developer, please Donate to this plugin.
For collaborations and consultations visit the website of the freelance web developer.
For bug reports and support for this plugin, visit the Support section to ask the developer and the community directly.
sections.installation:
To automatically install the “Cloud Customer Area” plugin you can search from the “Plugins > Add new” section of your WordPress dashboard and click on the “Install Now” button corresponding to this plugin.

To manually install the “Cloud Customer Area” plugin you can download the latest version from the WordPress.org site, and unpack the zip file in the “wp-content/plugins” folder of your CMS.

Now on the “Plugins” section of your WordPress dashboard you can see the “Cloud Customer Area” plugin, click on “Activate”.
sections.faq:
Who should use the “Cloud Customer Area” plugin?

The plugin is suitable for all workers / companies who exchange documents with customers.

What are the benefits of using the “Cloud Customer Area” plugin?

It does not affect the website or server performance, does not use the website or server storage space, security and performance guaranteed by Google Drive (15GB are free).

1.1.0
